reviews.headline: Awesome product, great app
reviews.comment: I have loved my K Ring for several years. Never take it off. Always there. My primary payment. Could not imagine life without the flexibility of contactless payments from a ring! The app now completes the journey. Easy access. Everything in one place. Everything at hand. Brilliant job guys!

reviews.headline: Intuitive and easy to use
reviews.comment: So good to finally be able to manage my payment ring on my phone

reviews.headline: Excellent User Interface
reviews.comment: The MyKRing App is simple to navigate with all key features accessible from the Home Page. The Auto Top-Up function is fantastic...

reviews.headline: Fantastic addition to the KW tech
reviews.comment: Nice to see all the feature there and easy to use bank load features. Really easy to use!

reviews.headline: Great App at last!
reviews.comment: Works well and quick, great contact with Dev team if needed. Well done guys.

gUx.title: Auto top-up
gUx.caption: Auto top-up has been turned off so the options are hidden

gUx.title: Auto top-up - active
gUx.caption: Auto top-up is on so the relevant options are shown
